Order #: Zip Code: Katom > Restaurant Equipment > Commercial Ice Makers Shop By Category Undercounter Ice Makers Head Only Ice Makers Head&Bin Combination Ice Makers Ice Dispensers Outdoor Ice Makers Water Filters Ice Maker Accessories
Shop By Brand Manitowoc Ice Hoshizaki Ice-O-Matic Scotsman Supreme Metal San Jamar Rubbermaid Infra Tablecraft Browne Foodservice Vollrath Win-Holt Winco Summit Refrigeration Cambro
Commercial Ice Makers
If you're in need of ice for your business you're in luck! KaTom sells commercial ice makers that produce impurity free ice for your clientele's beverages and more. We will include a free water filter with your purchase of a qualified unit! Having a hard time deciding if you need an commercial ice maker for cube, pearl, or flake ice or what size Commercial Ice Maker you need to keep up with business? Our staff will help you choose a commercial ice maker with the capacity, ice type, and speed!
Undercounter Ice Makers
Does your restaurant have little space for a large ice machine but must have ice for the buffet and/or drinks? KaTom Restaurant supply has your ice needs covered with a commercial undercounter ice maker! These models stay neatly out of the way while still making large amounts of ice. KaTom's commercial undercounter ice makers come in all sorts of ice styles and capacities so you're sure to find a model for your business's needs. The commercial undercounter ice maker for you is just a click away! Manitowoc Ice QY0134A Ice Maker W/ 80 lb Bin, Half Dice, 145 lb /24 hrs, Air Cooled $1,513.68 Manitowoc Ice QD0132A Ice Maker w/ 80 lb Bin, 145 lbs/24 hr, Full Cube, Air Cooled, 115/1 V $1,513.68
Head Only Ice Makers
Is your commercial head ice maker on it's last legs of life. Save money (and your existing holding bin) by purchasing a commercial head ice maker from KaTom Restaurant Supply! We sell several trusted brands so finding the fit for your ice bin will be no problem. Need cube ice or even flake ice? KaTom's selection of commercial head ice makers come in both styles as well as half cube, crescent, and nugget ice. Experience the great customer service and item pricing KaTom has to offer today! Manitowoc Ice IY-0454A-161 Ice Maker, Half Cube, 450-lb/24-Hr, Air Cooled, 115 V NEW LOW PRICE Manitowoc Ice ID-0852A-261 Ice Maker, Full Cube, 940-lb/24-Hr, Air Cooled, 208-230/1 V NEW LOW PRICE
Head&Bin Combination Ice Makers
Your business ice maker needs are just a click away at KaTom Restaurant Supply. When it comes to quality ice makers and bins you can count on KaTom's superb selection. Are you more interested in nugget ice or maybe flake style ice? No problem; KaTom carries ice makers that produce nugget, cube, crescent, half cube ice and more. Since KaTom keeps your budget in mind when pricing ice bins and ice machines you can be sure to find a model in your budget range. Manitowoc Ice ID0452A161B400 Ice Maker w/ 290-lb Bin, Full Cube, 450-lb/24-Hr, Air, 115 V NEW LOW PRICE Hoshizaki KM-515MAH B300PF Ice Maker w/ 300-lb Bin, Crescent Style, 501-lb/24 Hr, Air NEW LOW PRICE
Ice Dispensers
A drink just isn't the same without the refreshing kick of cold ice. Make portioning ice a quick and easy job with a commercial ice dispenser from KaTom! Adding a commercial ice dispenser can take pressure off of your fast food restaurant by making drinks self serve or quick to make for waiting customers. KaTom sells models for all types of ice including cube, nugget, and flake ice at large and small capacities. Cool down with a commercial ice dispenser from KaTom. Manitowoc Ice SN12A Ice Maker&Water Dispenser, 12-lb Bin, 325-lb/Day, Lever Activated NEW LOW PRICE Manitowoc Ice SN-12AT Ice Maker&Water Dispenser, 12-lb Bin, 325-lb/Day, Sensor Activated NEW LOW PRICE
Outdoor Ice Makers
Ice making machinery too often takes up space in a restaurant that could be put to better use. Keep your space free with a commercial outdoor ice maker from KaTom Restaurant Supply! The commercial outdoor ice makers we feature on our website are made with durable stainless steel and are for built in or free standing utilization. Experience the free shipping and great pricing you get with a KaTom commercial outdoor ice maker! Hoshizaki AM-50BAE Undercounter Ice Maker w/ 22-lb Bin, Top Hat Style, 55-lb/Day NEW LOW PRICE Hoshizaki C-100BAF-AD Undercounter Ice Maker w/ 22-lb Bin, Cubelet, 92-lb/24 Hr NEW LOW PRICE
Water Filters
Without commercial water filters the water food businesses use to make ice, drinks, and food would be impure and not really worth drinking. Keeping your water clean and impurity free is as easy as buying one of many quality commercial water filters from KaTom Restaurant Supply. Reduce the odors, bad flavors, and lime in your water with a commercial water filter and TASTE the difference pure water makes! Manitowoc Ice AR10000 Arctic Pure, Primary Water Filter Assembly NEW LOW PRICE Ice-O-Matic IOMQ Replacement Filter Cartridge For Ice-O-Matic IFQ1, IFQ2 $53.69
Ice Maker Accessories
Sure you have a fantastic ice maker but what are you going to use to scoop or transport the ice you need? Choose from a wide variety of commercial ice maker accessories at KaTom. Our commercial ice maker accessories include mobile ice caddy units and even ice safety funnels that help prevent wet floors and slips. Save your ice and your business's budget with KaTom Restaurant Supply's competitively priced ice maker accessories! Supreme Metal D-12-IBL Drop-In Ice Bin, 18 in x 12 in x 11 in $256.50 Supreme Metal D-24-IBL Drop-In Ice Bin, 18 in x 21 in x 10 in $336.60
